item.title: Server-side rendered SPAs with ASP.NET and no Javascript
item.description: Single-page applications (SPA) provide better user experience by removing full-page loads, giving smooth transitions between pages and performance improvements depending on the scale of the application, but they come at some costs which may not be worth for some application types. The main cost is the added complexity of a SPA framework like Angular or Vue. In this post, I’ll show how to use ASP.NET and HTMX to build single-page applications without using JavaScript and SPA frameworks.
